author: jmsnell
msg: Reworking of the JSONWriter.  This provides a more complete Atom-to-JSON conversion that includes extensions, support for atom:feed, app:service, etc.  This should be considered to be a work in progress rewrite.

Oh, and this gets rid of the dependence on the third party json.jar.  There is one method in the new JSONUtil class that was taken from the json.jar.  I will be rewriting that method soon.  We should be able to completely drop that jar from the dist.

author: awiner
msg: TRINIDAD-737: Need To Establish Currency for Table Events
- Patch from Max Starets - improve ease-of-use by making table and tree listeners fire with
the row key set to the first selected row (and ditto for anything in a facet of the
table or tree that isn't already in a specific row)

author: awiner
msg: Minor optimization - don't re-compute clientId, since we already computed it
